language.description: Controller for services offered through the BardCanvas Mobile App. Important: It must be extended by other modules in order to work.

authenticator.invalid_username_provided: Please specify a valid user name (lower case letters, numbers, dashes and underscores, no special characters or spaces).
authenticator.no_device_id_provided: Device identifier not received. It is not possible to find your account from this device.
authenticator.account_disabled: Your account is disabled. If you think this is an error, please visit our website and use the contact form to ask for help.
authenticator.unknown_device: Error: your device wasn't found on the database. Please delete this website from the app and add it again.
authenticator.disabled_account: Error: your account is disabled. You wont be able to login.
authenticator.disabled_device: Error: this device has been disabled. You will have to login to the website using a web browser and enable or delete this device and try again.

empty_token.title: Missing auth token
empty_token.raw_info: The app authentication token has not been received.
empty_token.info:
Sorry, but the BardCanvas app authentication token for Facebook authentication has not been received.

If you need assistance, please ask the tech support staff using our contact form.

missing_device.title: Missing device information
missing_device.info:
Sorry, but the information about your device is missing. It is neccessary to track your Facebook authentication request.

If you need assistance, please ask the tech support staff using our contact form.

authentication_page.title: Facebook authentication
authentication_page.info: In order to register this website with your Facebook account on the BardCanvas app, you need to open your Facebook session here and authorize the app.
authentication_page.post_info: If you wish to get information about your data usage, please open our website from a web browser and check our Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy. Visit the website now.

error_writing_file.title: Error while saving data
error_writing_file.info:
We couldn't save the required information to be retrieved by the app. There might be a problem in the server that it is preventing temporary data to be saved.

Please try again. If the problem persists, go to our contact form and report this error so the tech support staff can fix it.

authenticated.title: Successful authentication
authenticated.info:
The session information has been saved for {$display_name}.

Please close the browser and go back to the BardCanvas app to continue.

content.placeholder: Write your message. You can attach images using the control below.

prompts.disable_account:
Are you sure that you want to disable this account?
All the user's published elements will be hidden from indexes. The user wont receive any notification.

success_notifications.disable_account: The account has been disabled. You will need to refresh any website indexes or pages already open.

messages.missing_params: Expected params are missing. You've called this script in a wrong way.
messages.no_attachments_received: No media attachments have been received.
messages.invalid_file_uploaded: Invalid file uploaded. Please try again.
messages.file_type_rejected: Sorry, but the file type you've uploaded is forbidden.
messages.cannot_move_file: The file you uploaded cannot be processed. Please try again.
messages.cannot_create_temp_dir: Cannot create temporary data directory. Please inform the tech support staff of this website.

specs.title: Engine enabled
specs.description:
If you want to enable or disable all the mobile services, use this switch.

Note: When the mobile app conntects to the website, it will look for a services manifest. This module generates it using all the settings configured within these controls.

If the engine is enabled, you'll be able to see the manifest clicking here.

specs.title: Full title
specs.description: Title/name of the website as it is shown to the app user. If not provided, the website name will be used instead.

specs.title: Short name
specs.description:
Short name of this website. If not provided, the full title (as specified above) will be used.
If the website name or full title is too long, shorten it here to a couple of words.

specs.title: Services version
specs.description:
Use only an integer and decimals (E.G. 1.1) to define the version.
It should be incremented in case of modifying the services configuration.
Other modules may modify this value.

specs.title: Last update date
specs.description: Only for internal reference. Use the next format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm

specs.title: Fully qualified URL of the website
specs.description:
If this website could be accessed by www.dominio.com and/or dominio.com, please specify here which of them is the preferred entry point (with www, without www, http or https).
Important: If you have redirects in your entry point variants, please specify here one that is direct to avoid issues on the app.

specs.title: Description
specs.description: Brief description of the services offered by this website through the mobile platform.

specs.title: Site icon
specs.description: A 256x256 pixels image to show next to the website name on the app's menus.

specs.title: Languaje
specs.description: Specify the language in which the contents are shown (E.G. English (United States), Español (América Latina), etc.)

specs.title: Disclaimer
specs.description: If the website ofers delicate contents or services that require warnings, use this area to describe them. You can use basic HTML tags.

specs.title: Document links
specs.description:
If you wish to add on the website menu links to certain posts or important documents (E.G. Terms of use and Privacy Policy) use this area to define them, one per line, using the next syntax:

Title - id_or_slug

Examples:

About... - about
Terms of use - terms-of-use
Privacy policy - privacy-policy

specs.title: Require authentication
specs.description: If enabled, the app will request login credentials to the user and validate them before adding the site to the app.

specs.title: Owner name
specs.description: Name of the person or company that owns this website. Optional.

specs.title: Owner website
specs.description: It should start with http:// or https://. Optional.

specs.title: Services registry
specs.description:
Use this selector to enable/disable/reorder the services available for the user.

To modify the configuration of each service, use the individual controls below.
